name: draco-plate
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Dragon moves by 20%. Held by a Multitype Pokémon: Holder’s type becomes Dragon.
short_effect: Held: Dragon-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus’s and Judgment’s type to Dragon.

flavor_text.black_white: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.
